amendment.description: An amendment numbered 99 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funding for National Institutes of Health grant R01AI110964 "Understanding the Risk of Bat Coronavirus Emergence" and Cooperative Agreement U01AI151797 "Understanding Risk of Zoonotic Virus Emergence in EID Hotspots of Southeast Asia.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
